1: 만족스러운 듯이 자꾸 슬쩍 웃는 모양.

0: grinningly; with one contented smile after another
A word describing the motion of laughing quietly, continuously, feeling happy.

1: 입술을 크게 실그러뜨리며 소리 없이 능청스럽게 한 번 웃는 모양.
거볍게 슬쩍슬쩍 자꾸 흘겨보는 모양. ‘힐긋힐긋「1」’보다 센 느낌을 준다.
눈에 언뜻언뜻 자꾸 띄는 모양. ‘힐긋힐긋「2」’보다 센 느낌을 준다.

0: with one glance after another; with one look after another
A word describing the motion of looking at something briefly, repeatedly.
In the state of coming in and out of view briefly, repeatedly.

1: 거볍게 슬쩍 한 번 흘겨보는 모양.

0: grinningly; with one contented smile after another
A word describing the motion of laughing quietly, continuously, feeling happy.

1: 거볍게 슬쩍 한 번 흘겨보는 모양. ‘힐긋「1」’보다 센 느낌을 준다.
눈에 언뜻 띄는 모양. ‘힐긋「2」’보다 센 느낌을 준다.

0: with one glance; with one look
A word describing the motion of looking at something briefly one time.
In the state of coming in and out of view briefly.

0: A word describing the motion of laughing quietly once, feeling happy.

1: 거볍게 곁눈질하여 슬쩍슬쩍 자꾸 쳐다보는 모양.

0: with one furtive glance after another
A word describing the motion of directing the eyes sideways and looking furtively at something repeatedly.

1: 있는 힘을 다하여. 또는 힘이 닿는 데까지.

0: with all one's might; as far as one can
Exerting all one's power; or doing one's best.

1: 일에 정성이 없거나 마음이 들떠 건들건들 지냄. 또는 그런 모양.

근육이나 뼈 따위가 조금 실그러지며 떨리는 모양.

0: In the state of lacking the energy or desire to do something.
In a state of lacking power or authority, etc.

1: 코를 아주 세게 풀거나 콧김을 부는 소리.

0: A word imitating the sound of blowing one's nose hard or letting out breath through the nose.

1: 입을 볼썽사납게 벌리며 웃음을 참지 못하고 자꾸 싱겁게 웃는 소리. 또는 그 모양.

0: A word describing the motion of directing the eyes sideways and looking furtively at something one time.

0: with one furtive glance after another
